media.Description: GCS or local path to Windows Server ISO.

pwsh.Description: GCS or local path to PowerShell v7+ installer

dotnet48.Description: GCS or local path to Microsoft .NET Framework 4.8 offline installer

cloudsdk.Description: GCS or local path to Cloud SDK installer

description.Value: Microsoft, Windows Server, 2019 Datacenter, Server with Desktop Experience, MBR format x64 built on ${TIMESTAMP}

family.Description: Desired image family of the output image.

google_cloud_repo.Description: Google Cloud repo to retrieve packages from during the build.

name.Description: The name of the output image.

project.Description: The GCP project to create and store the image in.

updates.Description: GCS or local filesystem location containing Windows update files.

drivers_bucket.Description: GCS location containing the GCP Windows driver files.

install_disk_size.Description: The size of disk to provision for the image in GB.

workflow_root.Description: Root of github workflows, defaults to /workflows in the container.

sbom_destination.Description: The GCS url that the sbom file exported to.

sbom_util_gcs_root.Description: The root gcs bucket for sbomutil, if using sbomutil to generate the SBOM.
